channel.title: ZeroX Beta ~ FullScreen/Resizeable/Minigames/Bosses/Pvm/Pking/
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Hello there ladies and gentlemen! :D My name is Conner the Developer at ZeroX. We have been working on this project for awhile now and are ready to take this to the next step! We are opening up 'ZeroX Beta' Today. Ya right now, this minute, this second. We were so excited and ready to launch it. We want all of you to come and play and Beta Test. Sense it is in 'Beta Mode' You are able to 'Spawn ::item' and also 'Master ::master'. Okay so now i am going to tell you about some of the neat features![/B]
Links [IMG]https://www.sencha.com/forum/images/site_icons/forum.png[/img][URL=http://"http://rszerox.com/forums/"]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://cache.filehippo.com/img/ex/2187t__Internet_Download_Manager6_icon.png[/img][URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/r5bu6j36d4kv5gn/ZeroX.jar"]Download[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rszerox.com/vote/"]Vote[/URL]
Features ------------------------------------------------- [B] Gilded scimmy,boots Unique home. 99% Full Agility 100% RuneCrafting New Skill Teleport Tab 100% Prayer Fix Partyhat Box. New Java Icon for Clinet Fix Death Cape. ZeroX Sword. New Shop Zone. Nice Dzone Almost all skills 100% Pking Pvm Added Up Command Added Do/Down command 100% Fishing 90% Smithing 99% Cooking 99% Fletching Beta Mode Npc Points Background. Make Herb Shop Quest Tab Updating Clan Chat 100% Resizeable Client Full Screen Clipped Firemaking VPS. X10Hosting. Website. Fixed Npc Glitching Out Fixed SkillCape Shop Fixed Voting Shop Add Auto Donate Add Auto Vote Chaos Altar Recharges Special[/B]
[B]Remember that aint a fraction close to all the of the server features! Well I know some of us don't like to read soo I am going to show you guys some pictures :D[/B]
Pictures ------------------------------------------------- [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/dd7f5eee7898b4a928b6ef691ded7554.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/d9ddec3512ea010315a882f024757632.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/8acb3372e3c6be52c8af2e8640ca5d0f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/8249e5b9321770d0caf746f45021d0c2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Sp1WxlR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/0b35238554bff4d7dd862e8c62ef5faf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/056bc4741d25d6a4fcc52250b8b686f2.png[/img]
Want to see any more pictures? Just post below and ill add them! Thank you soo much guys! [/CENTER]

item.title: ZeroX Beta ~ FullScreen/Resizeable/Minigames/Bosses/Pvm/Pking/
item.dc:creator: @mattadog18 mattadog18
item.description:
@mattadog18 wrote:

[CENTER]Hello there ladies and gentlemen!
My name is Conner the Developer at ZeroX. We have been working on this project for awhile now and are ready to take this to the next step!
We are opening up ‘ZeroX Beta’ Today. Ya right now, this minute, this second. We were so excited and ready to launch it. We want all of you to come and play and Beta Test. Sense it is in ‘Beta Mode’ You are able to ‘Spawn ::item’ and also ‘Master ::master’. Okay so now i am going to tell you about some of the neat features!

Links
Forums
Download
Vote

Features


Gilded scimmy,boots
Unique home.
99% Full Agility
100% RuneCrafting
New Skill Teleport Tab
100% Prayer
Fix Partyhat Box.
New Java Icon for Clinet
Fix Death Cape.
ZeroX Sword.
New Shop Zone.
Nice Dzone
Almost all skills 100%
Pking
Pvm
Added Up Command
Added Do/Down command
100% Fishing
90% Smithing
99% Cooking
99% Fletching
Beta Mode
Npc Points
Background.
Make Herb Shop
Quest Tab Updating
Clan Chat 100%
Resizeable Client
Full Screen
Clipped Firemaking
VPS.
X10Hosting.
Website.
Fixed Npc Glitching Out
Fixed SkillCape Shop
Fixed Voting Shop
Add Auto Donate
Add Auto Vote
Chaos Altar Recharges Special

Remember that aint a fraction close to all the of the server features! Well I know some of us don’t like to read soo I am going to show you guys some pictures
